OOC: I agree with KSL. It was definately not Sadam Hussein.  One of the 
biggest suspects is Palestine, because there were reports that around the 
time of the attack, there was rejoicing in the streets there.  I live in 
North New Jersey, and a good portion of parents here commute to NYC, 
including my dad.  He was luckily not there, but i know of a few people whose 
fathers have not come home.  In my town there is a street called crest road, 
where you can look out and see the New York skyline.  Almost the entire town 
went there this afternoon, and just looked out, and saw, where the World 
Trade Center once was, just tons of smoke.  It was EXTREMELY depressing to 
everyone.

--part1_163.bdb038.28cffe14_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
